projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: This app helps to find weather of any place both by detecting the current location and by selecting a particular place from the dropdowns provided.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: It is a simple calculator app. It can be used to perform various mathematical calculations along with trigonometric operations as well.

projects.name: Employee Directory
projects.description: It is a CRUD app in which records of employees can be maintained. We can add a new employee, remove and even update records of an existing employee.

projects.name: Bank Loan System
projects.description: It is an app in which there are various applicants for loans and the operator can either accept or reject the application and the further course is thus decided
